title: SeM1:3-4
text: Develop and demonstrate strategies for managing and expressing one's own emotions to persevere in challenging situations. (Communication)
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can evaluate ways that I currently express emotions as either kind or unkind.
I can identify coping skills for specific situations that cause me to feel stress or uncomfortable emotions.
I can describe how I can use courage and perseverance to overcome a challenging situation.

title: SeM2:3-4
text: Demonstrate the skills related to achieving personal and academic goals. (Creative Thinking) SOCIAL AWARENESS
subject: Social-Emotional Learning
subs: I can recognize the connection between short-term and long-term goals.
I can set a goal, divide it into steps, and identify strategies to reach it.
I can develop and improve my daily organizational skills.
